jobDescription: Data Analyst  (Junior - Senior Level)  Location: Arlington, VA 22101  US Citizen, clearable to obtain DHS Suitability Clearance  Long Term -- Full Time (100% on Site)  Responsibilities: Implementation of Data Quality strategies to evaluate, monitor, and improve data asset.Work closely with technical staff to understand the data environment and develop data quality measurement and improvement strategies;Collaborate with internal data stakeholders at defining data quality requirements; and present data quality findings and recommendations to internal and external data stakeholders.Understand data sources, data flows, and end-user dataPerform detailed data analysis and profiling using Informatica Data Quality (IDQ) or similar toolsExtensive experience in developing SQL query for data analysisWorking with data stakeholders, define element level data quality requirements, rules and thresholdsUse data quality tools to build simple data quality monitoring rules, thresholds, and scorecardsPresent data quality metrics and trends to internal and external stakeholders facilitating discussion of data issues, root causes, and action plansCreate and maintain data quality documentationEvaluate data quality dimensions: completeness, validity, accuracy, timeliness, consistency and integrity against the data quality rules and produce a data scorecard that display the key data quality characteristicsDeliverables: Data Quality Assessment Action Plan/ Summary Report, Scorecards, Other Reports ( Rules, Audit, Recommendation)30% of the work is to support the agile process using JIRA software70% will be data any analysis and profiling using Informatica Data Quality (IDQ) or similar toolsShall work on 2-4 tables and scorecards  Requirement:BA/BS degree and up to 3 years’ experience. AA/AS degree and up to 6 years’ experience. No degree and up to 10 years’ experience.3 years Data Analysis experience with SQL query and Oracle experience is MANDATORY
